name: CroydonFM
0:
”Alexa, play Croydon FM”
”Alexa, open Croydon FM”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: croydon f. m.
des:
We are Croydon FM - broadcasting live from South London offering a range of live shows and regular news bulletins to keep you connected, informed, and entertained. 

Our programming is created by members who are based in and around Croydon—and they're all people like you! 

As such, we provide local people a voice and offer a first step into an industry that can be often hard to access. 

Listeners can tune in and get a daily dose of music and discussions that center around mental health, life aspirations, and personal development. We're on WhatsApp! Send us a message at 07494 696 978 or @croydonfm across social media.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
